visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#00008B) for the title and axis labels, with a font size of 14px. The x-axis should have a minimum range of 5, Data series: The data series should include monthly average temperatures for a year, Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series, Additional configurations: Enable x-axis zooming, set the chart background to a light gray color (#F5F5F5), and include a legend with a black border.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart displaying monthly average temperatures. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the title is 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The axes and labels are styled with a dark blue color and a font size of 14px. The x-axis has a minimum range of 5, and the data series includes monthly temperature data. The series color is a gradient from light blue to dark blue. Additional configurations include enabling x-axis zooming, setting the chart background to light gray, and including a legend with a black border. This setup ensures a visually appealing and functional chart for displaying temperature data.
